name: Diablo
description:
Diablo 1 with The Hell 2 mod https://www.patreon.com/thmod
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Before to launch this script, you will need to download TH2 build and TH2 music expansion from this page: https://www.patreon.com/thmod. You will need to provide diabdat.mpq during script install too.
- Known issues: 
-- move the mouse for menus to appear.
-- support and credits show only a black screen.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.th2music: N/A:Provide last TH2 music expansion from "https://www.moddb.com/mods/diablo-the-hell-2/downloads/th2-music"

execute.command: cd "$DISC"; ls | grep -i diabdat.mpq | xargs cp -t "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2";

cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2"; sed -i -e "s/screenwidth.*/screenwidth $RESOLUTION_WIDTH/g" -e "s/screenheight.*/screenheight $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT/g" -e "s/fullscreen off.*/fullscreen on/g" -e "s/Vsync off.*/Vsync on/g" config.ini;

content:
custom-name: Diablo - The Hell 2 mod
files:
- th2exe: N/A:Provide last TH2 build from "https://www.moddb.com/mods/diablo-the-hell-2/downloads/th2"
- th2music: N/A:Provide last TH2 music expansion from "https://www.moddb.com/mods/diablo-the-hell-2/downloads/th2-music"
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2/TH2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2
    file: th2exe
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2
    file: th2music
- execute:
    command: cd "$DISC"; ls | grep -i diabdat.mpq | xargs cp -t "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program
      Files/DiabloTH2";
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/DiabloTH2"; sed -i -e "s/screenwidth.*/screenwidth
      $RESOLUTION_WIDTH/g" -e "s/screenheight.*/screenheight $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT/g"
      -e "s/fullscreen off.*/fullscreen on/g" -e "s/Vsync off.*/Vsync on/g" config.ini;
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: false
